# Request for Proposal for Repairs to Energy Management Control Systems (EMCS) at CFB Halifax Debert Detachment

**Reference Number:** WS4139007853-Doc4201541775  
**Solicitation Number:** WS4139007853  
**Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)  
**Tender Category:** SRV (Services)  
**Trade Agreements:** The proposed contract is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.

**Objective:**

The Department of National Defence, represented by Public Services and Procurement Canada, is seeking bids from qualified contractors for the provision of labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required for the inspection, testing, repairs, additions, replacements, modifications, and servicing of existing Energy Management Control Systems (EMCS) equipment and devices at various locations within CFB Halifax Debert Detachment.

**Requirements:**

* Promise to deliver all required services, including labor, materials, equipment, and supervision, with no exceptions
*  Inspect and test the existing EMCS equipment and devices
*  Repair, add, replace, modify, and maintain EMCS equipment and devices as required
*  Perform facility maintenance and repair services
*  Provide energy management controls installation services

**Location:**

The services will be delivered at the CFB Halifax Debert Detachment, Nova Scotia, Canada.

**Deadline for Proposal Submission:**

Friday, October 19, 2023, at 14:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time).

**Inquiries:**

For any questions or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact Carlos Castillo Nieto from the Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC) at carlos.Castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
